meanings.definition: Slanting or sloping in direction or position
meanings.sent1: The obliques rays of the sun cast long shadows in the evening.
meanings.sent2: The obliques roof of the house allowed rainwater to flow easily.

meanings.sent5: The obliques mountain stood tall against the horizon, its peak disappearing into the clouds.

meanings.definition: Muscles on the sides of the abdomen, involved in twisting and bending movements
meanings.sent1: She felt a slight ache in her obliques after doing side crunches at the gym.
